title: Nomad by Pascal Blanché
author: Pascal Blanché
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Nomad by Pascal Blanché
text:
Skip to content
Issue 18 – March 2008Cover ArtNomadPascal Blanché is a French artist, with more than twenty-five years of experience in the gaming industry. By day, he works at Behaviour Interactive as Art Director. By night, he likes to work on more personal explorations and build bold new worlds.

 
 ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
